Athenura is a leading technology company specializing in AI and machine learning solutions.

patterns: How many months is the internship?
responses: The internship duration can be 3, 4, 6, or 8 months depending on the program selected.

patterns: Who is eligible for this internship?
responses: Every UG and diploma fresher student is eligible for the internship.
Skills depend on the domain. You can check detailed requirements on www.athenura.in/internship.
The selection process includes: 1) Resume Screening, 2) Telephonic Round, and 3) Technical & Communication Interview.
The internship is unpaid. However, interns can earn during client projects in the last month based on performance.
Certificates will be issued only to candidates who successfully complete the internship.
The internship mode is fully REMOTE.
You can contact us at hr.athenura@gmail.com or info.athenura@gmail.com. You can also call +91 98350 51934.
Placement opportunities are available for interns who complete 6 months or more of internship duration.

patterns: Will you help with job preparation?
responses: During the internship, we provide mock interview support to help interns prepare for job opportunities.
